articles.title: Reception Given at DPRK Embassy in Beijing
articles.content:
Reception Given at DPRK Embassy in Beijing 
Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) - A reception was arranged at the DPRK embassy in Beijing on Feb. 5 in honor of officials of the International Liaison Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China on the occasion of the New Year.
					Present there on invitation were officials of the International Liaison Department of the CPC Central Committee including its Head Wang Jiarui, its Deputy Head Liu Hongcai and Assistant to its Head Guo Yezhou.
					
					Choe Jin Su, DPRK ambassador to China, and staff members of his embassy in Beijing were present there.
					
					The ambassador in his speech said that the exchange and cooperation between the Workers' Party of Korea and the CPC are becoming very close under the deep care of the top leaders of the two countries.
					
					He affirmed that the DPRK would make all its efforts to contribute to boosting the friendly and cooperative relations between the two parties and the two countries by successfully holding events of the "Year of DPRK-China Friendship" as intended by the top leaders of the two countries.
					
					He hoped that the Chinese people would greet with successes the 60th anniversary of the foundation of the People's Republic of China this year under the leadership of the CPC with Hu Jintao as its general secretary.
					
					 The head of the department noted that the frequent exchange of high-level delegations and brisk exchange and cooperation in various fields between the two sides once again strikingly demonstrated the vitality of the traditional Sino-DPRK friendship.
					
					China could always hear the dynamic voices, notice the warm hands of help of the DPRK and feel its strong encouragement over the issue which the Chinese people consider most important, in particular, and whenever China badly needs help and support, he noted, adding that China would always remember this.
					
					He expressed belief that both sides would further deepen the friendship, boost exchange and strengthen the cooperation through diverse events and thus carve out more beautiful future of the Sino-DPRK friendly and cooperative relations in the "year of Sino-DPRK friendship".

articles.title: International Figure Skating Festival to Be Held
articles.content:
International Figure Skating Festival to Be Held
 Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- The 18th International Figure Skating Festival for Paektusan Prize will be held in Pyongyang on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 The festival to be held from Feb. 15 to 17 will involve demonstration presentations by excellent figure skaters from the DPRK and other countries.

articles.title: New Stamps Issued
articles.content:
New Stamps Issued
Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- New stamps (four sheetlets) reflecting the contents of the joint editorial of this year have been published in the DPRK.
					Printed on the upper parts of the stamps are the militant slogan of the editorial "Make the fullest development of Songun Korea by inheriting the great tradition of revolutionary upswing!" and other slogans implicating the contents of the editorial.
					
					The stamps also carry the words, slogans and others showing the fighting spirit of the Korean army and people who are dashing forward like the wind in the spirit and mettle displayed in the period of the great upswing of Chollima with a firm will to open the gate to a great, prosperous and powerful nation without fail in 2012 that marks the centennial birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					They also reflect the tasks of making a leap forward on all fronts for the building of the powerful nation through a new revolutionary upsurge, bringing about a decisive turn in the efforts for bettering the people's living standard and further developing the socialist culture.
					
					There are stamps mirroring the contents of the editorial on effecting a fresh turn in militia buildup this year that marks the 50th anniversary of the Worker-Peasant Red Guards, accelerating the movement of the national reunification under the banners of the June 15 joint declaration and October 4 declaration and on making a positive contribution to achieving the cause of global independence.

articles.title: Japanese Prime Minister's Anti- DPRK Remarks Blasted
articles.content:
Japanese Prime Minister's Anti- DPRK Remarks Blasted
 Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- Japanese Prime Minister Aso, when referring to the issue concerning the DPRK in his "policy speech for 2009," asserted that he "would strive to find a comprehensive settlement of the abduction, nuclear and missile issues and normalize the relations with it." 
					 What the chief executive of Japan uttered in his "policy speech" can be described as an orientation of its policy toward the DPRK for this year. But there is nothing new in it as it fully reflected Japan's existing hostile stand towards the DPRK.
					
					This is nothing but a trite political bargaining of the Japanese authorities far away from the core issue of the DPRK-Japan relations. 
					
					Japan's way of thinking which calls for regarding the settlement of abduction, nuclear and missile issues as a precondition for normalizing the relations with the DPRK is as shameless and wicked act as demanding a sort of reward from a victim.
					
					As clear to everybody, there have been no normal diplomatic relations between the DPRK and Japan and those of distrust and confrontation have persisted so far entirely because Japan has recklessly pursued a hostile policy toward the DPRK without making honest repentance and reparation for its past crimes.
					
					 The normalization of the bilateral relations should begin with Japan's sincere settlement of the crimes committed by it against the Korean people in the past century under any circumstances.
					
					 It is absolutely impossible to establish normal relations on the basis of confidence unless Japan settles the deep rooted grudge of the Korean people against it which committed so hideous crimes against them. 
					
					Japan's redress of its past crimes is a fundamental issue of putting an end to the history of the unfortunate relations between the two countries and normalizing the bilateral relations. 
					
					 Nevertheless, Japan is insisting on the preferential solution of what it called "abduction issue" and other issues and putting them up as a precondition for normalizing the bilateral relations, persistently dodging the liquidation of its past. This is preposterous, indeed. 
					
					 It is due to the mean attitude of Japan persistently denying its crime-woven past and clinging to the hostile policy towards the DPRK that the two countries have become geographically near yet distant countries and antagonism between them is steadily growing acute in the present century. 
					
					Once again explicitly speaking, the relations between the DPRK and Japan can never be put on normal footing unless the latter redresses its past and rolls back its hostile policy toward the former. 
					
					Japan would be well advised to give up such foolish political bargaining as trying to wrest any concession from the DPRK, while avoiding the settlement of its past. 
					
					 The army and the people of the DPRK find it hard to repress their towering resentment at the hostile policy pursued by the Japanese reactionaries towards it generation after generation and will surely force them to pay for it.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak's Ridiculous Sophism Blasted
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak's Ridiculous Sophism Blasted
 Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- Lee Myung Bak was so impudent as to let loose a spate of vituperations falsifying facts about the issue of inter-Korean relations at a "TV forum" held under the title of "round-table dialogue" on Jan. 30. This was ridiculous sophism intended to evade his responsibility for having driven the inter-Korean relations to uncontrollable catastrophe. 
					 Minju Joson Saturday says this in a signed commentary.
					
					 Lee let loose sophism that the deteriorating inter-Korean relations are "nothing new." This betrays his intention to conceal his crimes and, furthermore, further bedevil the said relations than now, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 This is evidenced by the fact that he talked nonsense that the "south-north relations will collapse if they make a haste start "and it is good for them "to start properly."
					
					 On the same day he jabbered that the "south-north relations will improve when the U.S.-north relations improve. This is little short of disclosing before the world the fact that south Korea is a colony of the U.S.
					
					 What should not be overlooked is that he dared bluster that "the north will come to know and should know" that the DPRK-U.S. relations can improve when there is "cooperation" from the south. The ill-intended "cooperation" touted by him this time is a sort of grumbling that the new U.S. Administration "should not unilaterally opt for improving its relations with the north without consent" of the south.
					
					 If Lee truly wants inter-Korean dialogue, he should kneel before the nation and apologize for having pursued confrontation, war and separatist moves, to begin with.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Right to Use Space for Peaceful Purposes
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Right to Use Space for Peaceful Purposes
 Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- On Feb. 2 Iran launched its indigenously manufactured carrier rocket, putting its satellite for scientific research and communication into orbit on the occasion of the 30th anniversary of the victory of the Islamic revolution in Iran. Iran put its satellites into orbit in 2005 and 2008 by rockets of Russia and China. But this time Iran succeeded in launching its third satellite entirely on its own. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 Iran's recent satellite launch has not only demonstrated her national power but shown before the world that there can be no longer any monopoly of space development and its use.
					
					 Iran has shown its will to take a more positive part in the race for advancing into space, defying any accusations of the above-said satellite launch by the United States and other Western countries, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 No one should be allowed to take issue with space development and its use or stand in their way as long as they are of peaceful nature and regarded as helpful to promoting the welfare of humankind.
					
					 Any country which stands for the peaceful use of space is entitled to advance into space any time and use it for peaceful purposes. 
					
					 The DPRK, a member of the international community, has an option to advance into space and a legitimate right to participate in the space scientific and technological race. 
					
					 It is the DPRK's stand and policy to make a positive use of space resources, wealth common to humankind, in an effort to enable the Korean people to lead a highly civilized and bountiful material and cultural life and bring bright future to the Korean nation. 
					
					 The DPRK has already set up institutions specializing in space research and development for peaceful purposes. 
					
					 The DPRK's scientists and technicians are now energetically pushing ahead with the work to make a peaceful use of space as required by the developing reality and the international trend. 
					
					The DPRK's policy of advance into space and its use for peaceful purposes is just as it meets the requirements of the developing times and no force on earth can block this, concludes the commentary.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised as Peerless Patriot Glorifying Era of Independent Reunification
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised as Peerless Patriot Glorifying Era of Independent Reunification
 Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il is the sun of the nation who ushered in a new era of independent reunification on this land, true to the last instructions of President Kim Il Sung, and a lodestar of national reunification to whom all the fellow countrymen are looking up. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday observes this in a signed article.
					
					 Steadfast is Kim Jong Il's revolutionary will to carry out the instructions of the President for national reunification, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 Fully reflecting the aspiration and wishes of the nation for independent reunification and peace and prosperity, Kim Jong Il put forward the line and policy of national reunification replete with the spirit of national independence, considering the reunification issue from his Juche-based view.
					
					 Possessed of matchless and extraordinary political caliber, he has led the difficult and complicated movement for reunification along a straight road of victory without the slightest deviation and turns and twists through his noble patriotic leadership and paved the way for advancing the cause of national reunification with an unchallenged edge of the Juche-oriented patriotic forces for reunification.
					
					Under the leadership of Kim Jong Il who has settled all the matters by relying on the concerted efforts of the popular masses the spirit of "By our nation itself" has become an idea common to the nation and the patriotic forces for reunification have rapidly grown stronger in south Korea, developing the reunification movement into a dynamic nationwide patriotic movement.
					
					 It is thanks to his noble benevolent politics that national reconciliation and unity have been put on a new phase and the driving force for national reunification has grown stronger than ever before. 
					
					 Thanks to the Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Il who has energetically pushed forward the building of a great prosperous powerful nation and the movement for national reunification with the invincible People's Army as the mainstay of the revolution, the moves of the bellicose forces at home and abroad for confrontation against reunification and for a new war are being decisively checked and frustrated and the cause of independent reunification is advancing on its orbit.
					
					 Sure is the victory of the cause of national reunification as the Korean people are holding Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the father of the nation and a lodestar of national reunification.

articles.title: All Koreans Called upon to Defend Peace
articles.content:
All Koreans Called upon to Defend Peace
 Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- All the Koreans in the north and the south and abroad should unite as one under the banner of "By our nation itself" and decisively frustrate the U.S. and the Lee Myung Bak group's moves for a war of aggression by dint of national unity and wage a courageous struggle for ensuring durable peace on the Korean Peninsula and thus vigorously advance the cause of independent and peaceful reunification of the country.
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday says this in a signed article.
					
					 Defending peace on the Korean Peninsula is a main precondition for achieving the independent reunification and peace and prosperity as early as possible by meeting the challenge of the anti-reunification forces at home and abroad and foiling their obstructive moves, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 Neither the improved inter-Korean relations nor the peaceful reunification of the country can be expected under the situation where the foes of peace and reunification have become undisguised in their play with fire and confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					In case another war breaks out on the Korean Peninsula, it is bound to develop into a nuclear war and put the nation's existence at peril. 
					
					 The country's peace and reunification can be achieved only when the Koreans shatter the U.S. and the south Korean warmongers' dangerous moves to escalate the military tension on the peninsula and launch a war of aggression against the DPRK. 
					
					 Peace can never settle on the land of Korea nor can the nation be free from the danger of a war as long as the U.S. military presence and domination over south Korea go on. 
					
					 The independent reunification of the country and national prosperity, the cherished desire of the Koreans, are sure to be achieved only when all of them decisively frustrate the moves of the separatist forces at home and abroad for a war of aggression against the DPRK and protect peace on the peninsula in a do-or-die spirit.

articles.title: Protests against Murder of Evacuees Continued in S. Korea
articles.content:
Protests against Murder of Evacuees Continued in S. Korea
Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- The struggle of people from different walks of life is going on in south Korea to denounce the puppet police and traitor Lee Myung Bak for having brutally killed evacuees, according to south Korean CBS and MBC.
					The All-People Committee for Measures against the Murder of Evacuees in Ryongsan held the 17th candlelight meeting for mourning the victims in Seoul on Thursday at which it demanded punishment of the mastermind of the violent suppression, an apology from traitor Lee Myung Bak, an impartial investigation by the prosecution and etc.
					
					On the same day, members of the Promotion Committee for Mass on Situation grouping the Buddhist Human Rights Committee and other Buddhist organizations held a mass on the situation in Seoul, condemning the recent murder in Ryongsan as a tragedy caused by the Lee Myung Bak regime's reckless "development policy".
					
					Meanwhile, the above-said all-people committee and bereaved families of the victims called a press conference in Seoul on Wednesday, urging Lee Myung Bak's apology for the murder of evacuees and punishment of the chief of the Seoul District Police Office who directly commanded the violent quelling operation of the police.
					
					On the evening of that day a candlelight rally took place at the Chonggye plaza in Seoul to cherish the memory of the victims and demand the punishment of murderer.

articles.title: Suppression of Hanchong Slashed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Suppression of Hanchong Slashed in S. Korea
Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions released a statement on Feb. 2 denouncing the puppet group for its crackdown upon the south Korean Council of Youth Organizations (Hanchong.)
					The statement charged that the Lee Myung Bak regime committed one more crime against democracy by instigating the Supreme Court to define Hanchong as an "enemy-benefiting organization" by dint of the notorious "National Security Law" on Jan. 30.
					
					The present authorities are following the evildoings conducted by the successive dictatorial regimes to crack down upon the population by use of such violent mechanisms as the prosecution and the police, it pointed out.
					
					It said that the said crackdown upon Hanchong, which has worked to implement the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, goes to prove once again the anti-reunification nature of the Lee Myung Bak regime. 
					
					Noting that the NSL, an evil law, has already had no reason to exist, it declared that the confederation would fight against the regime's outrages.
					
					Meanwhile, members of civic and public organizations in south Korea called a news conference in Seoul on the same day at which they protested the unreasonable judgment on Hanchong.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Censured for Bedeviling Inter-Korean Relations
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Censured for Bedeviling Inter-Korean Relations
Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- The Press Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration in south Korea issued a statement on Feb. 3 accusing the puppet authorities of having driven the inter-Korean relations into the worst crisis.
					The statement held that the chief blame for the deteriorated relations between the north and the south and their present military confrontation is on the Lee Myung Bak "government".
					
					The "government" invited the present tense situation by refusing to implement the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, it pointed out.
					
					Saying that the said declarations clearly elucidate the guidepost for peace and reunification of the Korean Peninsula and the ways for implementing it, the statement urged the authorities to immediately set out on the road for reconciliation and cooperation with the north.

articles.title: Solidarity with Korean People Expressed in Romania
articles.content:
Solidarity with Korean People Expressed in Romania
Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- A solidarity meeting took place in Romania on Jan. 24 to support the cause of the Korean people for national reunification.
					Displayed at the venue were photographs introducing the Korean people in the efforts for building a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation.
					
					Speeches were made there.
					
					Daniel Dediu, chairman of the Romanian Workers' Association, and the representative of the Romanian Branch of the Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain elaborated on the content of the joint editorial published by Rodong Sinmun, Josoninmingun and Chongnyonjonwi, newspapers of the DPRK, on the occasion of 2009, noting that it advanced the tasks and ways for achieving the independent and peaceful reunification of Korea. 
					
					They expressed full support and solidarity with the Korean people in the efforts to achieve national reunification under the banner of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.

articles.title: DPRK's Efforts for Peace Supported in Switzerland
articles.content:
DPRK's Efforts for Peace Supported in Switzerland
Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee issued a statement on January 31 in support of the statement of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea.
					Stating that the south Korean puppet regime is entirely to blame for the tense and serious situation prevailing on the Korean Peninsula, the statement charged that the traitorous and anti-reunification Lee Myung Bak group pushed the inter-Korean relations into crisis as soon as it took power.
					
					All the agreements adopted between the north and the south of Korea in the past have been reduced to dead documents by traitor Lee Myung Bak, it pointed out, saying it is self-evident that the DPRK has no need to be restrained to the past inter-Korean agreements under such condition.
					
					All decisions on the inter-Korean relations, clarified in the statement of the CPRK, were just and legitimate answers to traitor Lee Myung Bak's bellicose policy of confrontation, it declared, adding:
					
					We will support any steps taken by the DPRK.
					
					We slash at the south Korean regime's criminal and traitorous war policy and will solidarize with the DPRK in the struggle to defend peace on the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige sobre terreno el Complejo de Abonos de Hungnam
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige sobre terreno el Complejo de Abonos de Hungnam
Pyongyang, 7 de febrero (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea dirigio sobre el terreno el Complejo de Abonos de Hungnam.
					Le acompanaron el secretario Kim Ki Nam y el jefe de departamento Pak Nam Gi, del Comite Central del PTC. 
					
					Al recorrer varios procesos de produccion nuevamente reconstruidos se entero de los detalles del estado de renovacion tecnica y de la produccion.
					
					Al ver el aspecto laboral de los obreros del Complejo se mostro muy satisfecho de que todos los militantes del partido y otros trabajadores hacen esfuerzos abnegados por llevar a cabo la causa de la construccion de una gran potencia prospera.
					
					Senalando que el complejo de Hungnam  desempeno el papel vanguardista en la modernizacion y la cientifizacion de los procesos de produccion conforme a la demanda de la epoca de la industria de informatica en pleno acato a la idea del Partido del Trabajo de Corea de dar importancia a la ciencia, evaluo altamente sus proezas.
					
					Son muy importantes la posicion y el papel de este complejo en la labor para llevar a la etapa alta la produccion agricola, destaco y presento las tareas programaticas que incumben a este complejo.
					
					Subrayo que hay que enviar gran cantidad de abonos al campo para resolver el problema de alimentos y anadio que los obreros de Hungnam se encargan de esta tarea pesada pero honrosa.
					
					El complejo presento la construccion del nuevo proceso de produccion de amoniaco segun la gasificacion, lo cual es una iniciativa audaz y creadora que reflejo la demanda apremiante del desarrollo de nuestra agricultura, senalo y soluciono en persona los problemas pendientes tras consultar minuciosamente los medios de esta construccion junto con los funcionarios del complejo.
					
					Tras recorrer la ciudad de Hamhung dirigio sobre el terreno la labor de construccion revisando la maqueta de plan de construccion urbana.
					
					Enseno que a fin de construir con vistas al futuro la ciudad homonima donde viven muchos obreros como una moderna ciudad que convenga al gusto de la epoca del partido del trabajo es precioso hacer bien el diseno para que se materialicen cabalmente los principios del socialismo y de la popularidad, construir especificamente todos los objetos, entre otros, la formacion de carreteras, la forma de edificios y su ubicacion, la creacion de lugares de recreo y la formacion de zona de cultura y deporte y en particular, prestar gran atencion a la construccion de infraestructura y la calefaccion urbana.
					
					El Dirigente valuo que para solucionar el problema de energia electrica de la ciudad de Hamhung la provincia hace bien los preparativos tras presentar la meta de construir por cuenta propia la central hidroelectrica de gran capacidad en corriente abajo del rio Kumjin e ilumino el rumbo y los medios para terminar en un corto espacio de tiempo la construccion.
					
					Al ver los productos recien desarrollados por la filial de Hamhung de la Academia de Ciencias hizo conocimiento del estado de investigacion.
					
					Se puso muy contento de que los cientificos y tecnicos de esta filial desarrollaron los materiales de construccion a estilo coreano dedicando todas sus inteligencias y entusiasmos y evaluo sus esfuerzos.
					
					El dirigente se entero de las labores de la provincia de Hamgyong del Sur en su conjunto durante su visita de orientacion a esta provincia y dilucido otra vez el camino a seguir por la provincia.
					
					Senalo que la provincia ocupa el lugar importante  en el desarrollo economico del pais porque tiene numerosas empresas de la industria clave y particularmente grandes fabricas que se encargan de la porcion importante en la solucion del problema del vestido, alimento y alojamiento e indico que la provincia debe jugar el rol vanguardista en la lucha por abrir las puertas a la gran potencia prospera.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il inspecciona comandancia de unidad No. 324 del EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il inspecciona comandancia de unidad No. 324 del EPC
Pyongyang, 7 de febrero (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, inspecciono la comandancia de la gran unidad combinada No. 324 del EPC.
					Guiado por el comandante de esta unidad, el Dirigente recorrio primero la sala de presentacion del historial.
					
					Recordando con profunda emocion las inmortales hazanas del Presidente Kim Il Sung inscritas en cada capitulo de la historia de la unidad, apunto que gracias a la sabia direccion y minuciosa atencion del Presidente, ella pudo crecer como poderosa gran unidad combinada compuesta de las unidades adscritas, incluyendo las combinadas, capaces de uno versus cien enemigos.
					
					Elogiando el hecho de que la gran unidad combinada realiza activamente las labores educativas a traves de la perfectamente acondicionada sala de presentacion del historial, senalo que se debe intensificar la educacion en las nobles virtudes del Presidente para que todos los militares guarden siempre en su corazon las incalculables benevolencias dispensadas por el.
					
					Acto seguido, leyo los registros victoriosos que muestran la orgullosa trayectoria de la unidad coronada con meritos.
					
					Evaluo altamente los meritos de los militares de la unidad subrayando que esta tiene la tradicion de haber realizado orgullosos meritos en la defensa de la patria y la construccion socialista al servir al partido y el lider, a la patria y el pueblo con incomparable abnegacion patriotica y heroismo masivo desde los dias de la encarnizada guerra coreana (de junio de 1950 a julio de 1953) hasta hoy.
					
					 El Dirigente averiguo en detalles el estado de cumplimiento de la mision por la unidad y presento las tareas programaticas, que se presentan para fortalecer por todos los medios la combatividad de la unidad, luego de encomiar a todos los oficiales y militares de ella que cumplen con responsabilidad la guardia avanzada vigilando agudamente los movimientos agresivos de los enemigos.
					
					Acto seguido, se entero del estado de entrenamiento de los oficiales de mando recorriendo la sala de estudios de la operacion y la casa de tiro.
					
					Muy complacido de que la unidad prepara a todos los oficiales de mando como los competentes con gran capacidad organizativa de la operacion y el combate y de comando a traves de las excelentes salas de estudios militares y de los ejercicios sustanciales, recalco que ellos deben poseer la capacidad de mando conveniente a los combates modernos al establecer un revolucionario modo de entrenamiento.
					
					Paso revista a las instalaciones de educacion ideo-cultural como la biblioteca cerciorandose en detalles de la marcha de la labor politica sobre los militares.
					
					Se puso contento de que estos establecimientos fueron acondicionados magnificamente de acuerdo con las caracteristicas de los militares y se realizan en ellos de manera fresca y profunda las labores politicas, y destaco la importancia de prestar siempre primordial atencion a la labor ideologica.
					
					Es muy loable que todos los militares de la unidad estudiaran con entusiasmo con gran apego a la lectura, dijo y aprecio altamente el modo revolucionario de lectura establecido en la unidad.
					
					Seguidamente, hizo conocimiento de la situacion de la administracion de la unidad caminando por el recinto de la comandancia.
					
					 Reconocio los exitos logrados anteriormente por la unidad diciendo que ella registro un avance vertiginoso en todos los aspectos desde el entrenamiento politico-combativo hasta la administracion de la unidad.
					
					 El Dirigente se fotografio junto a los uniformados de la gran unidad combinada.
					
					Le acompanaron los generales de ejercito del EPC, Hyon Chol Hae y Ri Myong Su, y otros miembros directivos del EPC.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il presencia la funcion artistica de Unidad No. 324
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il presencia la funcion artistica de Unidad No. 324
Pyongyang, 7 de febrero (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, presencio la funcion del grupo de propaganda artistica de la gran unidad combinada No. 324  junto con los oficiales y soldados, del EPC.
					Le acompanaron los generales de ejercito Hyon Chol Hae y Ri Myong Su y otros miembros directivos del EPC, el secretario Kim Ki Nam y otros cuadros directivos, del Comite Central del PTC.
					
					Los ejecutantes pusieron en la escena el solo masculino "Anorando al General", el coro masculino "El es yo mismo", el coro femenino "Fue caliente el corazon del soldado" y otras piezas.
					
					A traves de la funcion ellos mostraron bien la firme conviccion y voluntad de los militares del EPC dispuestos a defender a costa de la vida a la Direccion de la Revolucion y llevar a feliz termino con armas la causa revolucionaria del Juche iniciada en la selva del Paektu.
					
					Los ejecutantes, al demostrar sin reserva aquel entusiasmo y  espiritu con que en las trincheras, los campos de entrenamiento y lugares de construccion  habian llamado con la propaganda y agitacion combativas a los militares a la lucha y las hazanas, probaron con firmeza la justeza y la vitalidad de la orientacion del PTC de hacer propaganda artistica a  la manera de guerrilla antijaponesa y  manifestaron patentemente el poderio de la unidad de artistas militares que siembran en cada corazon de los militares el ferviente amor al partido y el lider, la patria y el pueblo y cumplen mejor su sagrada mision de trompeta de la epoca del Songun (priorizacion militar).
					
					El dirigente elogio que los miembros del grupo de propaganda artistica de esta unidad libran las energicas actividades artisticas para la educacion ideologica a los militares.
					
					Subrayo que es muy importante la propaganda artistica porque tiene gran influencia y el poderoso caracter llamativo en la educacion ideologica para los militares y presento las tareas que se presentan para fortalecer la labor de propaganda artistica revolucionaria y combativa.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il ve funcion de artistas de provincia de Hamgyong del Sur
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il ve funcion de artistas de provincia de Hamgyong del Sur
Pyongyang, 7 de febrero (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, presencio la funcion de musica y danza, que ofrecieron los artistas del Conjunto Artistico de la Provincia de Hamgyong del Sur.
					Le acompanaron en esta ocasion el secretario Kim Ki Nam, los jefes de departamento, Jang Song Thaek y Pak Nam Gi, y otros cuadros directivos del Comite Central del PTC, los generales de ejercito del EPC, Hyon Chol Hae y Ri Myong Su, y otros miembros directivos del ejercito.
					
					El conjunto presento en la escena el solo femenino "Himno al camarada Kim Jong Il", la danza "Arreboles en Kangson", el solo femenino y coro "La cancion del vanguardia de Chollima" y otras variadas piezas.
					
					Los ejecutantes describieron bien el espiritu revolucionario, el optimismo, la fe en la victoria y la indoblegable voluntad del pueblo coreano, que avanza como gigante hacia la cumbre de la gran potencia prospera levantando en alto la antorcha del nuevo y gran auge revolucionario encendida por el Dirigente, y manifestaron patentemente el poderio de su conjunto crecido como colectivo artistico revolucionario en el regazo del partido.
					
					El Dirigente respondio al saludo de los ejecutantes y espectadores, que le vitoreaban, y felicito a los primeros por la exitosa funcion.
					
					Se mostro muy satisfecho de que los artistas del conjunto ofrecieron esta excelente funcion de alto nivel ideo-artistico y les expreso agradecimiento tras apreciar altamente sus exitos logrados en este espectaculo.
					
					Reconocio los meritos de ellos destacando que anteriormente, este conjunto de larga historia contribuyo en gran medida a la creacion de las obras artisticas como operas revolucionarias y cumple satisfactoriamente su mision y deber de verdadero creador y resuelto defensor de la cultura y el arte socialistas al crear hoy tambien numerosas magnificas obras artisticas de alto nivel ideo-artistico conforme a la demanda del nuevo siglo ateniendose de continuo a los originales principios y el estilo de creacion del PTC, que habian sido empleados en la creacion de las 5 operas revolucionarias.
					
					 Elogio repetidamente la emprendedora actitud creadora de los artistas del conjunto diciendo que ellos pudieron mejorar constantemente su nivel de interpretacion porque se esforzaron tenazmente dedicando toda su inteligencia y pasion por elevar su habilidad artistica.
					
					 Al subrayar que dar la idea, la moral y la cultura verdaderas necesarias al hombre para vivir como humano independiente es la mision principal del arte jucheano, indico las tareas programaticas que se presentan para desarrollar el arte conforme a la demanda de la epoca del Songun (priorizacion militar).

articles.title: Tendra lugar XVIII Festival de Patinaje por Premio Paektusan
articles.content:
Tendra lugar XVIII Festival de Patinaje por Premio Paektusan
Pyongyang, 7 de febrero (ATCC) -- Con motivo del dia de nacimiento (16 de febrero) del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, tendra lugar del dia 15 al 17 en esta capital el XVIII Festival Internacional de Patinaje Artistico por Premio Paektusan.
					En este evento habra la actuacion modelo de los excelentes patinadores de Corea y otros paises del mundo.
